text:
@piersmorgan @BorisJohnson Italy: Population - 60m
Coronavirus cases - 21,157
Deaths - 1,441

UK: Population: 66m
Coronavirus cases - 1,372
Deaths - 35

Italy had their first confirmed case 24hrs before the UK

....and still some say we should be doing what Italy has done?!
